PART_1:
COBEP 2021 will be hybrid, in person in João Pessoa at the Hotel Manaíra and virtually on the Softaliza + Zoom platform!

COBEP 2021 will have face-to-face, virtual and hybrid activities.
CARD_1:
In-person Activities
  • - Poster Sessions
  • - IEEE WIE PELS Breakfast
  • - schnapPYS - IEEE YP Happy hour
  • - Sponsor booths
CARD_2:
Virtual Activities
  • - Tutorials
  • - Online Sessions
  • - Sponsor's Talks
  • - Sponsor booths
PART_2:
In hybrid activities, there will be real-time transmission and interaction between participates and speakers, whether virtual or in person.

Work Presentations
CARD_4:
Online Sessions

They will be totally virtual and with the objective of discussing the works. maximum 5 minutes to summarize your work and then it will be open for debate. The presentation schedule is available on our website.
CARD_5:
Online Sessions

They will be fully presential and with the objective of discussing the works. The presentation will be made through poster.
PART_3:
• - If no presenter appears for the article, it will be considered NO SHOW!
  • - The schedule of presentations is available on our website: Online Session(link) and Poster Session(link).
  • - The presenters of all works must be present at the beginning of your session according to the schedule.
  • - Remembering that the presenter of the work must be registered for the congress.

Presentations of the works

All COBEP 2021 participants will have access to the virtual platform!

On the virtual platform, your interaction counts. of the congress, the three participants who score the most will receive an award!
